Name: Mövenpick Hotels & Resorts
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Issy-les-moulineaux, 92130
Company description: In Switzerland, in 1948, Ueli Prager created Mövenpick, a revolutionary dining concept where anyone could enjoy a taste of good wine, good times and the good life. Today that same brand of welcoming hospitality lives on in every Mövenpick hotel, where everyone can appreciate life’s essential pleasures, through moments of true indulgence. With more than 120 hotels and resorts in over 35 countries, Mövenpick remains true to its Swiss heritage and rich culinary legacy, honoring its founder’s promise to do things well by doing things right. In recognition of the brand’s holistic approach to sustainability, and its deep commitment to local environments and communities, Green Globe has named Mövenpick the world’s most sustainable hotel company every year since 2017.   Mövenpick is part of Accor, a world leading hospitality group and a participating brand in ALL - Accor Live Limitless, the hotel loyalty program spanning over 40 brands and 5,600 destinations.

Name: Accor
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Issy-les-moulineaux, 82 Rue Henri Farman, 92130
Company description: We are Accor We are more than 290,000 hospitality experts placing people at the heart of what we do, creating emotion for our guests, and nurturing passion for service and achievement beyond limits. Building on the strength of our teams and of our fully integrated ecosystem of leading brands, personalized services & expert solutions, we break new ground to reimagine hospitality and inspire new ways to experience the world. We are dedicated to suit all desires and needs, and reinvent the guest experience every day with our 45 hotel brands across all segments- 5,600 properties around the world from luxury five-star palaces to smart economy hotels, exquisite residences to full-service resorts. Because we take care of millions of guests and each of our hotels is a world in itself, where every action counts. We strive to make positive impact both locally and globally, to ensure hospitality benefits not only the few, but all.

Name: Golden Tulip Hotels Suites & Resorts
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Puteaux
Company description: Golden Tulip Hotels, Suites & Resorts is a prominent hospitality brand under the Louvre Hotels Group, offering a range of upscale accommodations designed for both business and leisure travelers. With a mission to provide exceptional service and comfort, Golden Tulip aims to create memorable experiences for its guests through elegant design and high-quality amenities. The brand's hotels are strategically located in key urban areas, such as Lille, near major attractions like the Stade Pierre Mauroy, catering to a diverse clientele that includes tourists, business professionals, and event attendees. Golden Tulip partners with local businesses and organizations to enhance guest experiences and promote regional tourism, while its target market encompasses both domestic and international travelers seeking a blend of luxury and convenience.

Name: Sofitel
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: At Sofitel, we are more than luxury hotels. Guided by our French zest for life, we  inspire heartfelt encounters shining a light on vibrant local cultures with our remarkable savoir-faire, and heartfelt service. With more than 120 addresses worldwide, Sofitel aspires to ignite love, unlock the extraordinary, and foster discovery in every stay. Through the fusion of French zest and local culture, be it the culinary artistry of a thoughtfully crafted dish, the exhibition of captivating local artistry, or the serenity of our wellness spaces, we harness the transformative power of our cultural link. At Sofitel, it's within these moments that we reinvent luxury, etching an indelible impression on your heart and soul. Sofitel also includes Sofitel Legend, six hotels, six living legends, where secrets are whispered, where past meets present and where awe-inspiring stories unfold every day.

Name: Pullman Hotels & Resorts
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Issy-les-moulineaux
Company description: A new perspective Enjoy an exhilarating experience in more than 155 must-see destinations around the world. Where superior comfort, inspiring spaces, unexpected flavours and fascinating cultures come together to create new perspectives.   Pullman is part of Accor, a world leading hospitality group and a participating brand in ALL - Accor Live Limitless, the hotel loyalty program spanning over 40 brands and 5,600 destinations.

Name: Swissôtel Hotels & Resorts
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Issy-les-moulineaux, 82 Rue Henry Farman, 92130
Company description: Swissôtel Hotels & Resorts is a luxury hotel brand that offers a unique blend of Swiss hospitality and local charm, exemplified by its flagship property, Swissôtel Resort & Spa, Çeşme. Located in the picturesque region of Çeşme, Turkey, the resort features 248 spacious guest rooms and 18 suites, along with diverse dining options and a state-of-the-art spa and fitness center. The company's mission is to provide exceptional service and create memorable experiences for its guests, who range from leisure travelers seeking relaxation to business clients looking for premium accommodations. Swissôtel aims to be a leader in the hospitality industry by focusing on quality, sustainability, and the well-being of its guests, while fostering partnerships with local businesses and communities to enhance the overall guest experience.

Name: Groupe Pierre & Vacances-Center Parcs
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris, 11 Rue De Cambrai, 75947
Company description: Leader européen du tourisme de proximité, le Groupe Pierre & Vacances-Center Parcs développe et gère – depuis plus de 50 ans – des concepts de vacances et de loisirs innovants dans le respect de l’environnement. Son business model repose sur deux métiers complémentaires : l’immobilier et le tourisme. Ses marques à forte notoriété - Pierre & Vacances, Center Parcs, Sunparks, Aparthotels Adagio®, maeva.com - proposent des expériences dans 280 destinations en Europe, à la mer, à la montagne, à la campagne ou au cœur des villes.   Chez Pierre & Vacances-Center Parcs nous sommes 12 000 entrepreneurs responsables et nous avons la conviction que cultiver le vivre-ensemble n’est pas qu’un concept mais un leitmotiv pour offrir à plus de 8 millions de vacanciers, des instants de partage et convivialité, en famille ou entre amis, à la découverte des plus belles régions européennes !   Découvrez les belles histoires que nous écrivons jour après jour, suivez toutes nos actualités et participez aux coulisses de l’aventure aux côtés de la #PVCPTeam !     Pour mieux nous connaître, visitez notre site www.groupepvcp.com et suivez-nous sur Twitter @GroupePVCP

Name: Raffles Hotels & Resorts
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Issy-les-moulineaux, 82 Rue Henry Farman, 92130
Company description: Raffles Hotels & Resorts is a luxury hospitality brand celebrated for its iconic hotels and exceptional service, seamlessly blending heritage with modernity. With a mission to provide unparalleled experiences that evoke emotions, Raffles is dedicated to creating memorable stays for its guests through personalized services, including the renowned 24-hour butler assistance. The brand primarily caters to discerning travelers seeking opulence and sophistication, often attracting high-profile clients and dignitaries. Raffles collaborates with various partners in the luxury sector to enhance its offerings, ensuring that each property, from Raffles Singapore to Raffles Shenzhen, reflects the local culture while maintaining the brand's signature elegance. The target market for Raffles Hotels & Resorts includes affluent individuals and families, business travelers, and event organizers looking for exquisite venues for prestigious gatherings. With a rich history dating back to the early 20th century, the company aims to provide guests with a unique blend of legendary style and contemporary luxury. This commitment is evident in its signature Raffles Butler Service, exquisite dining options, and world-class spa facilities.  Raffles Hotels & Resorts partners with local artisans to preserve cultural heritage while offering modern amenities, ensuring that each guest's experience is both authentic and luxurious. With properties located in prime destinations around the globe, including Phnom Penh, Singapore, and Boston, the brand is steadfast in its commitment to creating memorable moments for its guests, whether for leisure, business, or special occasions.

Name: B&B HOTELS GROUP
HQ Location: France, Brittany, Brest
Company description: B&B HOTELS GROUP is a prominent hotel chain that specializes in providing comfortable and affordable accommodations across various locations, primarily in Europe and the United States. The company is dedicated to delivering a welcoming atmosphere and high-quality service, ensuring that guests enjoy a pleasant stay whether they are traveling for business or leisure. With a mission to deliver value for money, B&B HOTELS focuses on customer satisfaction, which is reflected in the positive feedback regarding their friendly staff and clean facilities. The hotel chain caters to a diverse clientele, including families, business travelers, and pet owners, ensuring that all guests feel at home during their stay. B&B HOTELS is known for its commitment to quality, offering essential amenities such as complimentary breakfast, free Wi-Fi, and pet-friendly policies, making it an attractive choice for travelers seeking convenience and value. The company partners with local suppliers to provide fresh and sustainable food options, reinforcing its dedication to quality and community engagement. This focus on local partnerships not only enhances the quality of their offerings but also supports sustainable practices within the communities they serve. With a reputation for reliability and comfort, B&B HOTELS GROUP has become a preferred choice for those exploring popular destinations like Florida and various cities in France. The target market includes tourists seeking convenient lodging options, as well as business travelers looking for essential amenities that cater to their needs. Overall, B&B HOTELS GROUP strives to create memorable experiences for its guests, making it a leader in the affordable hospitality sector.

Name: Groupe Barrire
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris, 33 Rue D'artois, 75008
Company description: Founded in 1912 by François André, the Group has grown over the years under the successive stewardships of Lucien Barrière, Diane Barrière-Desseigne and Dominique Desseigne to become France’s leading casino operator, a standard-setter in the luxury hotel sector and a global player in the leisure and entertainment sectors. Barrière has designed unrivalled offers in the field of high-end leisure, founded on a commitment to operational excellence, service quality and French art de vivre. The Group today operates 33 Casinos Barrière (including one opening soon in Abidjan), 16 Hôtels Barrière (a majority are 5-star, including one under construction in Courchevel ) and more than 120 restaurants and bars, including the famous Fouquet’s in Paris (with branches in Marrakesh, Cannes, Toulouse and La Baule). It also stages more than 3000 shows and events every year. With more than 6000 employees, the Group posted earnings of €1.21 bn for the financial year to 31st October 2015. Barrière has an excellent reputation in the catering industry and serves more than 2 million meals each year. With twelve spas (in Cannes, Courchevel, Deauville, Dinard, Enghien-les-Bains, La Baule, Lille, Marrakech, Paris and Ribeauvillé), one thalassotherapy centre in La Baule, one balneotherapy centre in Ribeauvillé, three golf and two tennis clubs (with more than 32 clay courts), Barrière is also an established name in the well-being and sport sector. The Group is well known for its chain of resorts located in internationally-renowned tourist destinations.

Name: Louvre Hotels Group
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Puteaux
Company description: Louvre Hotels Group is a major player in the global hospitality industry, with a portfolio that now includes over 1,750 hotels in 70 countries.  It has a full hotel offering, spanning 1 star to 5 stars, with the brands: Première Classe, Hosho, Kyriad, Campanile, TULIP Hotels & Residences, Golden Tulip and Royal Tulip; the 5 brands of the Sarovar network in India, the French Group Hôtels & Préférence and the brand TemptingPlaces. Louvre Hotels Group is a subsidiary of Jin Jiang International Holdings Co., Ltd., the 2nd hospitality group in the world.

Name: MAMA SHELTER
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Mama Shelter is a vibrant hospitality brand that redefines the traditional hotel experience by offering a unique blend of comfort, style, and culinary excellence across its various locations worldwide, including cities like Nice, Paris, and London. The company operates hotels and restaurants that cater to a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers, families, and business professionals, creating a welcoming atmosphere that encourages community and connection. Mama Shelter's mission is to create inclusive environments where all guests, including those with disabilities, can enjoy their services without barriers, ensuring that everyone feels at home. With a focus on sustainability and local partnerships, Mama Shelter enhances the guest experience by collaborating with local artisans and chefs to provide authentic culinary offerings and lively events. The brand's vision emphasizes accessibility, both physically and digitally, as it strives to improve the overall experience for all customers. Mama Shelter targets a modern audience that values creativity and comfort, appealing to young professionals, families, and tourists seeking engaging and memorable stays. Through innovative programs like Disloyalty, Mama Shelter partners with various organizations to offer exclusive benefits for dining and travel, further enriching the guest experience. The company aims to be a go-to destination for those looking for quality food, lively social spaces, and a sense of community, all while supporting the neighborhoods in which it operates. With its eclectic design and commitment to exceptional service, Mama Shelter continues to expand its footprint in key cities around the globe, fostering a sense of belonging and creativity in every location.

Name: Cheval Blanc
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris, 12 Cours Albert 1er, 75008
Company description: Cheval Blanc, groupe LVMH, est né de l’envie d’offrir une vision singulière, personnalisée et résolument moderne de l’hôtellerie de luxe. Depuis 2006, nos Maisons se développent à Courchevel, aux Maldives à Randheli, à St-Barth, à St-Tropez, à Paris et aux Seychelles. Rejoindre Cheval Blanc est avant tout une histoire d’envies.  L’envie de se dépasser, d’étonner, de faire plaisir, de partager.  Laissez-vous guider par vos envies, laissez-nous vous surprendre par vos talents. Cheval Blanc, part of the LVMH group, was founded on the desire to offer a singular, customised and resolutely modern experience in luxury hotels. Since 2006, our Maisons bloomed in Courchevel, Maldives Randheli, St-Barth, St-Tropez, Paris and Seychelles. Joining Cheval Blanc is above all a question of desires.  The desire to go the extra mile, to dazzle, to delight and to pass on.  Let your desires guide you, let us surprise you with your talents.

Name: Belambra
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Bourg-la-reine
Company description: Belambra is a prominent player in the hospitality industry, specializing in the operation of clubs and hotels that cater to both family and corporate clients. The company is dedicated to providing exceptional experiences in unique natural settings, such as its club located in a 23-hectare pine forest, which features diverse wildlife and original architectural designs. Belambra's mission revolves around creating memorable stays through a combination of quality accommodations, varied dining options, and extensive recreational facilities, including a 1000 m² aquatic space. The company partners with various stakeholders to enhance guest experiences and is committed to ensuring customer satisfaction through its services. With a focus on both leisure and business travelers, Belambra aims to be a leading choice for those seeking relaxation and adventure in picturesque environments.

Name: Adagio Aparthotels
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: The Aparthotels Adagio, offer comfortable and spacious apartments in urban locations, with fully equipped kitchen and hotels services for extended stays based on attractive tiered pricing from fourth night onwards.  Created 2007 in partnership with AccorHotels and Pierre & Vacances Center Parcs Groups, the brand provides 3 product ranges: - Adagio, the upper midscale aparthotels in the heart of Europe’s leading cities;  - Adagio access, economic range, aparthotels located on cities’ doorstep. - Adagio premium, prestigious aparthotels, located in the heart of strategic cities, for customers seeking high standards of quality and aesthetics. The network has 129 aparthotels and 14,500 apartments in Europe, targeting 200 aparthotels in the world by 2027.  Further information about the Aparthotels Adagio on www.adagio-city.com. << Join us on Facebook (Aparthotels Adagio), Twitter (@Adagio_Officiel) and Pinterest (Adagio_Officiel) >>

Name: Hôtel Lutetia
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris, 45 Boulevard Raspail
Company description: Hôtel Lutetia is a prestigious luxury hotel situated in the heart of Paris, celebrated for its rich history and elegant design. As a member of the esteemed Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group, the hotel seamlessly combines classic Parisian charm with modern luxury, catering to discerning travelers who seek an exceptional hospitality experience. The mission of Hôtel Lutetia is to provide unparalleled service and create memorable moments for its guests, ensuring that each visitor feels valued and pampered during their stay. The hotel attracts a diverse clientele, including affluent leisure travelers, business professionals, and high-profile events, all drawn to its prime location and exceptional amenities. Hôtel Lutetia is committed to sustainability and responsible hospitality, aligning with the Mandarin Oriental Group's mission to create positive impacts for the planet and its people. The hotel has successfully eliminated 99% of single-use plastics and achieved 100% responsible sourcing for key products, reflecting its dedication to environmental responsibility. With a focus on guest well-being, Hôtel Lutetia aims to create a safe and enjoyable experience, evidenced by high guest satisfaction scores regarding its sustainability efforts. The hotel collaborates with local artisans and cultural institutions to enhance its offerings, providing guests with a rich cultural experience that reflects the vibrant Parisian lifestyle. Its vision is to be a leader in the luxury hospitality sector, continuously striving for excellence through innovative dining, holistic wellness, and a commitment to community engagement. By targeting a sophisticated market that appreciates fine dining, wellness, and cultural experiences, Hôtel Lutetia positions itself as a sought-after destination for those looking to immerse themselves in the essence of Paris.

Name: Le Méridien Tahiti
HQ Location: French Polynesia, Îles Du Vent, Punaauia, 98718
Company description: A place to awaken your senses Le Meridien Tahiti is a modern and luxurious resort offering you the opportunity to awaken each of your senses. The resort offers an unique experience at the edge of a lagoon on one of the island's most beautiful white sandy beaches. The hotel, renovated in 2010/2011, will bathe your senses in exceptional views of the lagoon, the island of Moorea and an the coral garden. Gourmet, art discovery & award... Discover at Le Meridien Tahiti its Polynesian dance show accompanied by a delicious seafood buffet at La Plantation. Its gourmet restaurant Le Carré, on the edge of the lagoon, is serving delicated cuisine. Release your creative minds during personalized Art Workshop at l'Atelier, a place at the resort dedicated to culture and artists, to exchange your passion, to discover and to socialize...

Name: Evian Resort
HQ Location: France, Evian-les-bains, 74501
Company description: Au pied des Alpes, l’Evian Resort est l’un des plus prestigieux Resort au monde. À seulement 45 km de Genève et de son aéroport international, ce havre de paix offre deux hôtels de luxe, le Royal *****, tout juste rénové, et l’Ermitage****, 11 restaurants & bars, 2 spas, les Thermes d’evian, un casino, un parcours de golf 18 trous et son centre d’entraînement, un club enfants, un service Sport & Culture et l’auditorium de la Grange au Lac.   Chaque année, l’Evian Resort organise de multiples événements dont deux d’envergure internationale : l’Evian Championship, seul tournoi Majeur d’Europe Continentale de golf féminin ; et le festival de musique de chambre des Rencontres Musicales d’Evian.   L’Evian Resort est une société du groupe Danone, une des entreprises les plus dynamiques du secteur alimentaire. ------------------------------------ NOTRE MISSION Fidéliser une clientèle exigeante nationale et internationale, en proposant des expériences mémorables, luxueuses, authentiques et exceptionnelles de ressourcement et de bien-être. ------------------------------------ NOS VALEURS - Humanisme : Dans toutes ses actions, l’Evian Resort respecte la dimension humaine. - Ouverture : L’Evian Resort se rend disponible pour mieux comprendre l’autre. - Proximité : L’Evian Resort maintien en permanence le lien avec l’autre. - Enthousiasme : L’Evian Resort transmet une énergie positive dans toutes ses actions.

Name: Eden Rock - St Barths
HQ Location: Saint Barthélemy
Company description: Eden Rock - St Barths is a luxurious hotel situated on the picturesque island of St Barthélemy, renowned for its stunning views and exceptional service. As a proud member of the prestigious Oetker Collection, the hotel has established itself as a premier destination for discerning travelers seeking an elegant and indulgent escape. Originally founded in the 1950s by adventurer Rémy de Haenen, Eden Rock has evolved into a glamorous retreat that attracts a clientele of celebrities, affluent vacationers, and families looking for a serene getaway in a tropical paradise.  The mission of Eden Rock is to provide an unparalleled experience characterized by personalized service and meticulous attention to detail, embodied by their dedicated team known as the "Eden Rockers." The hotel offers a diverse range of accommodations, including individually styled rooms, signature suites, and private villas, each designed to blend sophistication with Caribbean charm. Guests can enjoy gourmet dining options, wellness services, and bespoke events, all tailored to create memorable moments. Eden Rock - St Barths targets an affluent market, collaborating with high-end travel agencies and luxury brands to enhance the guest experience. The hotel is committed to sustainability and actively participates in local environmental initiatives, reinforcing its reputation as a responsible luxury destination. With its breathtaking surroundings and dedication to excellence, Eden Rock - St Barths aims to be the ultimate retreat for those looking to indulge in the art of relaxation and luxury in the heart of the Caribbean.

Name: Ritz Paris
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: At the heart of the capital, Place Vendôme, the Ritz Paris possesses that indescribable charm that makes it one of the most iconic hotels in the City of Light. Refinement of French savoir-vivre, elegance of a Belle Époque decor, the 142 rooms and suites with absolute comfort bear the names of Coco Chanel, Fitzgerald, or even Proust, who felt at home at the Ritz. The Ritz Paris is the place for all desires. The brasserie at Bar Vendôme invites you to delights to be enjoyed at any time. In the Salon Proust, near the fireplace and the large library, one can take part in a French-style afternoon tea ceremony. Not to mention the Bar Hemingway and the Ritz Bar where our Head Bartenders reinvent the magic of midnight in Paris every night. With a new chef, a new culinary journey, a new setting: Chef Eugénie Béziat welcomes guests with her sensitivity between two continents at the Michelin-starred Espadon restaurant. At the Ecole Ritz Escoffier, beginners and enthusiasts can learn about French cuisine and pastry. The Ritz Club & Spa and its sumptuous pool make relaxation a true art of living, a timeless escape. Paris is a celebration, the Ritz is the key. We look forward to welcoming you at 15 Place Vendôme

Name: The Hyatt Student Prize
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Careers in the world of international luxury hospitality are unique and enriching. They require a variety of skills, engagement and above all, passion. Our company has been committed to the development of the Leaders of tomorrow for the past 60 years and to the active support of the schools who inspire students to pursue careers in this field.  We believe that great leaders inspire trust so that their colleagues are confident and develop a growth mindset. We believe that great leaders should be mindful, caring and focus on the well-being of their teams in order to achieve results. We also believe that they should be eager to continue learning throughout their career. This mindset is the foundation of The Hyatt Student Prize which was founded in 2008 on behalf of Hyatt Hotels and Resorts. Because it fosters strong links with professionals, The Hyatt Student Prize has been opening doors for 10 years to students of the world’s best hotel management schools. In a decade, we have enabled about 100 students to demonstrate their talent and start a career in an environment matching their qualifications and expectations.

Name: Vatel Business School - Hotel & Tourism Management
HQ Location: France, Auvergne-rhône-alpes, Lyon
Company description: Vatel has more than 50 hospitality management schools located in Europe, in the Americas, in Asia and in Africa. They share the same mission: preparing the younger generations to build their professional futures in the international hospitality and tourism management industries. Vatel has decided to: - Teach management techniques based on two centuries of history in the hospitality industry, based on high-quality services and customer satisfaction. This includes all cultural aspects of clients, from the country where the hotel is located to the personnel working in it. - Convey the French art of hospitality, recognized all throughout the  world as a sign of quality, good taste, and excellence.  - Teach French in all non-French speaking countries where our Group operates. We now have 42,000 alumni who are working throughout the world and who are proud to call themselves Vateliens and to work in the most beautiful hotels on earth.

Name: Grape Hospitality
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Courbevoie
Company description: Grape Hospitality runs, owns, and manages 85 hotels and more than 60 restaurants in 8 European countries.  With a workforce of 2,000, Grape Hospitality is a business with a human face.  Our Group is dedicated to revitalising our establishments by means of attractive, innovative renovations which meet the modern-day expectations of the clientele, and to building up the catering business by creating new concepts and incorporating high-quality commercial brands within our hotels, to give our clients a new experience.  At Grape Hospitality, success is multi-facetted!  As value creators, we want to encourage you to:  - Make your dynamism, your enthusiasm, and your sense of innovation available to the clients.  - Be authentic. So, just be yourself, wherever you are and whatever job you’re in.  - Develop your personal and professional talents.   - Fulfil yourself by partnering your personal success with that of a team.  But what really counts is the smile on your face, and on the faces of our clients!

Name: Concorde Hotels & Resorts
HQ Location: France
Company description: Concorde Hotels & Resorts today represents 23 4- and 5- star hotels worldwide. Mythical hotels such as the Hôtel de Crillon and the Lutetia in Paris, Hôtel Martinez in Cannes, Hôtel de la Paix in Geneva and great business properties such as the Princesa Sofia in Barcelona, the Concorde La Fayette in Paris and the Concorde Berlin...  Unique but not uniform  is the slogan of our group. Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/concordehotels Follow us on Twitter: @concordehotels

Name: PARIS SOCIETY
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Paris Society is a premier hospitality group that operates the Refuge de Solaise, the highest hotel in the French Alps, located at over 2,500 meters in Val d'Isère. The company is dedicated to providing a unique mountain experience, combining elegance and warmth with contemporary design, offering guests a range of accommodations, dining options, and wellness facilities. With a mission to reconnect guests with nature, Paris Society aims to create memorable experiences in breathtaking settings. The Refuge de Solaise features 16 rooms, four apartments, a dormitory, a spa with a 25-meter pool, and two restaurants, catering to a diverse clientele seeking luxury and adventure in the mountains. The company values talent and teamwork, ensuring a supportive environment for its employees while maintaining high standards of service and quality.

Name: Edmond De Rothschild Heritage
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Créé en 2016 et implanté sur 4 continents, Edmond de Rothschild Heritage s’attache à partager un art de vivre unique et authentique pour transmettre aux futures générations un patrimoine moderne, respectueux des traditions, des hommes et de la terre. Avec 500 hectares de vignes minutieusement réparties dans le monde, les équipes vinicoles subliment des terroirs et domaines d’exception pour produire des vins singuliers. Aussi, l’art de vivre Rothschild s’exprime pleinement sur les hauteurs de Megève, au Domaine du Mont d’Arbois, depuis 1920 : de somptueux hôtels (dont le Four Seasons Hôtel Megève 5*), des restaurants gastronomiques et un golf de 18 trous. Une expérience unique qui se poursuit en Espagne, au cœur de la Rioja, avec le Palacio de Samaniego. Des lieux sans pareil, qui ont une âme, celle de la famille. C’est également en région parisienne, fidèle à la vision de ses aïeux, qu’Edmond de Rothschild préserve et magnifie le poumon vert de la capitale : exploitation agricole, unité de méthanisation, élevage laitier et fromagerie célèbre pour le seul et unique Brie de Meaux Fermier AOP qu’elle produit. En Isère, les Pépinières de l’Ambre, elles, magnifient la nature dans ce qu’elle a de plus précieux. Edmond de Rothschild Heritage cultive des savoir-faire rares et précieux dans le respect de ses valeurs originelles : excellence, authenticité et passion. Sa philosophie : donner du sens à l’exceptionnel. Les produits Edmond de Rothschild Heritage sont disponibles sur le Wine Club.

Name: Thalazur
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Levallois-perret
Company description: Grâce à son expertise reconnue en Thalassothérapie, hôtellerie et Spa, la marque Thalazur rayonne depuis plus de 20 ans sur 9 escales en France. De la Normandie à la méditerranée en passant par l'atlantique, notre collection d’hôtels se distingue par son savoir-faire et la qualité de ses séjours bien-être (de 1 à 6 jours et plus)

Name: Appart'City
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Appart’City is a leading French company specializing in aparthotel accommodations, with a network of around 100 establishments across France, Belgium, and Switzerland. Established over 20 years ago, the company has built a strong connection with both professional and amateur sports, recently becoming the official host for the Fédération Française de Triathlon (FFTRI) until 2025. Appart’City's mission is to provide tailored lodging solutions that cater to the specific needs of athletes, offering a range of apartments equipped with essential amenities such as kitchens, workspaces, and comfortable bedding. The company targets both business and leisure travelers, including sports teams, and emphasizes a commitment to sustainable tourism, with nearly half of its properties certified as environmentally friendly. With a dedicated team of 1,200 employees, Appart’City is recognized for its commitment to diversity and employee satisfaction, making it a preferred choice for those seeking quality accommodations.

Name: EXOTISMES
HQ Location: France, Provence-alpes-côte D'azur, Marseille
Company description: EXOTISMES is a travel company specializing in creating unforgettable experiences in exotic destinations, primarily focusing on the Caribbean, Indian Ocean, and Polynesia. With a mission to provide personalized travel solutions, EXOTISMES offers a wide range of services including island combinations, cruises, and themed trips such as honeymoons and family vacations. The company partners with renowned hotel chains and local accommodations to ensure high-quality stays for its clients, who range from couples seeking romantic getaways to families looking for adventure. EXOTISMES aims to cater to diverse travel preferences, making it a go-to choice for travelers seeking unique and luxurious experiences in some of the world's most beautiful locations.

Name: Le Royal Monceau - Raffles Paris
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: The contemporary and glamorous Le Royal Monceau - Raffles Paris reopened in 2010 as the most exciting 5-star luxury hotel in Paris, after a radical and complete two-year transformation by designer Philippe Starck. In 2015, the property’s “Palace” distinction was renewed, rewarding the hotel another five years of its prestigious 5-star excellence rating.  Located near the Champs-Elysées in Paris' 8th arrondissement, Le Royal Monceau – Raffles Paris, is known for its contemporary art and as a rendez-vous for artists and writers as well as luxury seekers and adventurers.  The omnipresent artistic atmosphere and vibrant culture comes to life through the property’s exclusive Art Concierge, the Art Bookstore, a private Art District Gallery, a 99-seat Katara Cinema theatre and an impressive private art collection.  With its 149 Parisian designed bedrooms and spacious suites, including 3 private apartments, the only contemporary Palace in Paris is only steps from the Arc de Triomphe.  Acclaimed for its international culinary offerings, the hotel’s award-winning restaurants showcase the property’s creative spirit, from the animated Long Bar to its three restaurants: ‘Matsuhisa Paris’ is dedicated to Japanese gastronomy from the famous Chef Nobu and ‘Il Carpaccio’, is a gourmet Italian restaurant in collaboration with Da Vittorio family. Not to be missed are the outstanding brunches and breakfasts at La Cuisine restaurant with Pastry Chef Quentin Lechat’s delicacies.  Furthermore, the 1,500sqm Spa My Blend by Clarins is an award-winning paradise, featuring the longest swimming pool of any Parisian Palace.

Name: Les Clefs D'Or International
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Les Clefs d’Or is a professional association of hotel concierges in virtually every corner of the world. Our organization has over 4000 members in 80 countries and 536 locations. Our members are easily identified by the crossed golden keys on our lapels. We are an elite association, globally connected, committed to professional development, and driven to setting new standards for guest service perfection. With roots dating back to 1929, officially founded in France in 1952, Les Clefs d  ́Or is a not-for-profit organization based on two pillars: service and friendship. To earn the right to wear the golden keys, aspiring concierges must have several years of experience as a hotel concierge, pass comprehensive testing and prove beyond doubt their ability to deliver the highest quality of service.  We are local experts with access to our global network of members. No one knows the world like Les Clefs d’Or.  Never outsourced, Les Clefs d’Or Concierges are directly employed by the hotels we work in. We offer an unbiased service not aligned with tour companies or other service providers. We always have your best interest at heart. The golden keys are your assurance that everything we recommend is the best choice for you! This is our promise. Our recommendations are based on personal experiences and „up to date“ knowledge. Our members are local experts because we go where we recommend. Serving more than 100 million guests every year, Les Clefs d’Or members fulfil an infinite variety of requests from the everyday to the extraordinary.

Name: Zenitude Groupe
HQ Location: France, Grand Est, Schiltigheim
Company description: Zenitude est un groupe français de résidences hôtelières, étudiantes et seniors qui s’engage à vous offrir le meilleur pour vos séjours de courte ou longue durée. Nos résidences sont le compromis idéal entre le confort, la qualité et le prix avec une grande offre de services et à proximité des centres-villes, transports et des commerces. Nos équipes restent disponibles, à votre écoute et proposent une offre adaptée à vos besoins pour des séjours loisirs ou affaires, de 1 nuit à plusieurs mois dans nos logements entièrement équipés. Certaines de nos résidences hôtelières disposent de tous les équipements nécessaires (salles de séminaire, business corner, restaurant, etc.) et sont le lieu idéal pour vos événements d’entreprise. Découvrez les destinations de nos 99 résidences dans toute la France sur notre site : www.zenitude-hotel-residences.com

Name: Hôtel Le Negresco
HQ Location: France, Provence-alpes-côte D'azur, Nice
Company description: Hôtel 5 étoiles mythique situé sur la Promenade des Anglais. Palace de légende parsemé d'œuvres d'art, il est l'un des lieux les plus emblématiques de la French Riviera. Son restaurant Le Chantecler* revisite habilement les codes de la grande gastronomie en leur accordant légèreté et sincérité. Il propose un talentueux hommage aux produits de la région.   La Rotonde est l’expression même de la Riviera, version chic et décontractée. Cette grande brasserie est une véritable institution chère au cœur des Niçois. Sa nouvelle parure conserve l’ambiance chaleureuse qu’on lui connaît avec une nouvelle petite note “glamour” très Negresco. Les beaux chevaux de manège viennent ponctuer le décor de touches drôles et légères.  Avec ses boiseries authentiques en noyer de 1913 et son exceptionnelle tapisserie de 1683, le Bar du Negresco est un lieu de dégustation feutré. Le soir venu, il vit au rythme des accords de jazz, pop et soul. Différents salons sont à découvrir et permettent aux professionnels de réaliser séminaires, réceptions, lancement de produits ou conseils d'administration dans des conditions optimales. Retrouvez ici les offres d'emploi et nouvelles à destination des professionnels.

Name: Brit Hotel
HQ Location: France, Brittany, Rennes
Company description: Brit Hotel is a prominent hotel chain in France, offering a range of accommodations from 2 to 4 stars, with a focus on comfort and convenience for travelers. The Brit Hotel Saint Malo Le Transat, located near the Grand Aquarium and just minutes from the beaches and city center, exemplifies the brand's commitment to providing quality lodging with modern amenities, including free WiFi, air conditioning, and accessible rooms. The company's mission is to ensure a pleasant stay for all guests, catering to both leisure and business travelers, with a target market that includes families, couples, and solo adventurers. Brit Hotel values customer satisfaction, as evidenced by its high ratings and positive reviews, and aims to create a welcoming atmosphere through attentive service and comfortable accommodations. The hotel chain also fosters partnerships with local attractions and businesses to enhance the overall experience for its guests.

Name: TRIBE Hotels
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Issy-les-moulineaux, 82 Rue Henri Farman, 92445
Company description: TRIBE Hotels is a series of contemporary hotels for the new breed of traveller.  We call TRIBE an edited hotel experience, focusing on what’s important and removing what’s not-design-driven luxury without the 5-star price tag. Our spaces accommodate the primary needs of our guests as the boundaries between work and play continue to blur. Tribe is re-defining the way we stay. Built smart to deliver the seamless hotel experience we’re passionate about, TRIBE believes in pushing boundaries and challenging convention. We’ve pioneered a seriously efficient proprietary modular build system to contain our costs and our environmental footprint. Lean and green. At TRIBE, there’s really nothing complicated.  Hotels, re-thought. #tribehotels #jointribe

Name: The Village At River Landing
HQ Location: New Caledonia, Wallace
Company description: The Village at River Landing was first developed with the idea that prospective employees of then Murphy Family Farms would have a great place to call home. Since then it has transformed into over 1600 acres of home sites, lakes, walking paths, and golf courses, along with 8 venues spaces throughout the property for meetings, weddings, parties, retreats, and more. The Mad Boar restaurant, Murphy's Irish pub, Village Subs, Village Store, luxury cottages and suites, and an award-winning hotel all reside here too.

Name: Buddha-Bar Worldwide
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Since its creation in 1996, Buddha-Bar Paris has been the precursor to a true 'Art of Living' concept, with confluent influences from the Pacific Rim. This restaurant-bar-lounge, located on the ultra-chic Faubourg St Honoré, was created thanks to the visionary imagination of its founder Raymond Visan, owner of the famous Barfly in Paris.  On a constant quest for new ideas gathered during his numerous trips, particularly to California, Mr. Visan launched the Buddha-Bar that rapidly became a must-see and be-seen in the French capital.   For 21 years, the Buddha-Bar concept has continued to grow and spread its positive energy throughout the world, with restaurants, hotels, spas, beauty care lines, music… today, it is found in over 25 countries and tomorrow... many more.   Buddha-Bar cultivates its concept with its Parisian and international clientele, by providing much more than an invitation to travel to distant lands, through its exotic cuisine from around the world… It offers a fully original experience.

Name: La Réserve Paris - Hotel And Spa
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: A mi-chemin de la rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré et de l'avenue Montaigne, à deux pas des Champs-Elysées, là palpite le cœur de Paris. Lovée au calme, en retrait de la plus belle avenue du monde, La Réserve Paris-Hotel and Spa a vue sur le Grand Palais, la Tour Eiffel, le Panthéon et l'obélisque de la Concorde. Juste devant, un rideau d'arbres majestueux préserve l'intimité des lieux, comme un écho aux Jardins de l'Elysée tout proche. Le nouvel hôtel (très) particulier de Michel Reybier possède l'élégance d'un appartement privé du XIXe siècle, où les services ultra personnalisés se vivent en toute simplicité et discrétion. Nous recherchons des talents (h/f) dotés de personnalités uniques, passionnés par l'hôtellerie de prestige et prêts à s’investir pour créer une atmosphère hors pair, chaleureuse et authentique pour nos clients et nos collaborateurs. Vous avez un sens inné du service, un goût certain pour la perfection et le désir de relever un véritable défi, nous vous invitons à nous faire parvenir votre candidature (CV + Lettre de Motivation) : Service Recrutement | carriere@lareserve-paris.com

Name: Costes
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Un hôtel, trois maisons et de belles connexions

Name: Hotel Du Lac
HQ Location: France, Auvergne-rhône-alpes, Talloires-montmin, 40 Rue Andre Theuriet, 74290
Company description: With lovely views of the lake and surrounding hills, Le Lac has a heated outdoor pool in shady gardens, and is just 100 metres from the beach on Lake Annecy. Guests can play tennis, table tennis or make the short trip to the Lac D’Annecy golf course, just 1 km away. Guest rooms at Le Lac have floor-to-ceiling windows, which offer plenty of natural light, and flat-screen TVs. They are spacious and some of them feature a furnished balcony with garden or lake side views as well as free WiFi access. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served. Breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. The hotel is 13 km from Annecy. Activities within 200 metres of the hotel include mini-golf, bike rental, water skiing and rowing. Free private parking is available on site.

Name: NAOS HOTEL GROUPE
HQ Location: France, Nouvelle-aquitaine, Poitiers, 86360
Company description: Naos Hôtel Groupe exploite des hôtels sur le territoire français en partenariat avec des enseignes internationales. Avec un portefeuille de plus de 20 hôtels, Naos hôtel Groupe développe des programmes diversifiés sur des segments haut de gamme. Naos Hôtel Groupe offre à ses collaborateurs l'opportunité de participer à la création et à l'exploitation de programmes hôteliers en adéquation avec l'évolution d'un monde nouveau.

Name: Molitor Paris - MGallery
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Molitor, an iconic place to experience Paris differently.  Inaugurated in 1929, Molitor was for 60 years the most popular swimming pool in Paris for its two pools, its galas and its avant-garde atmosphere.  Closed in 1989 and listed as a historical monument, the venue was taken over by artists who turned the abandoned building into a huge urban art space, becoming the temple of the Parisian underground. On 19 May 2014, after 3 years of construction work, Molitor wrote a new chapter in its history by becoming the current venue based around three words: Pool, Art, Life.  Today, Molitor is part of the Accor Group's MGallery Hotel Collection brand. Much more than a hotel, it is first and foremost a multi-faceted place to live that brings together Parisian, French and international customers to enjoy wellness, sporting, artistic and culinary experiences. Since 1929, Molitor has been able to astonish, surprise, magnify, create and innovate.  Today, one of the teams' missions is to keep the "heart of Molitor" beating, while combining the art of service with the art of living.  Welcome to Molitor!

Name: Chabé
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Chabé, une entreprise familiale fondée en 1921, est un expert reconnu dans le domaine de la mobilité sur mesure, se spécialisant particulièrement dans le transport haut de gamme pour les hôtels de luxe. Avec une mission axée sur l'excellence et une vision de long terme, Chabé s'engage à offrir des services personnalisés qui répondent aux besoins spécifiques de ses clients, notamment les établissements hôteliers prestigieux. L'entreprise entretient des relations durables avec ses partenaires, certains d'entre eux collaborant depuis plus de 60 ans, ce qui témoigne de sa fiabilité et de son savoir-faire. Chabé se distingue par sa capacité à anticiper les défis du transport, en garantissant un service irréprochable et en s'adaptant aux exigences de ses clients, qu'il s'agisse de transferts ponctuels ou d'événements spéciaux. En intégrant des valeurs familiales fortes et une culture d'entreprise axée sur le développement des talents, Chabé continue de se positionner comme un acteur incontournable dans le secteur de la mobilité de luxe.

Name: Hospitalité Saint-Thomas De Villeneuve
HQ Location: France, Brittany, Lamballe, 29 Rue Charles Cartel, 22400
Company description: L’Hospitalité Saint-Thomas de Villeneuve rassemble 20 établissements sanitaires et médico-sociaux à but non lucratif : hôpitaux, cliniques, services d’accueil des personnes âgées, foyers de vie pour adultes en situation de handicap, en Bretagne, Provence et Pays-de-la-Loire.  L'Hospitalité a été créée en 2010 par la Congrégation des Soeurs hospitalières de Saint-Thomas de Villeneuve pour conforter et développer les établissements, dont certains existent depuis plus de 360 ans. Le siège de l'Hospitalité est à Lamballe (22). Quel que soit leur secteur d’activité ou le territoire sur lequel ils sont implantés, les établissements partagent tous la même ambition : aller au-devant des personnes fragiles pour mieux en prendre soin et les accompagner. Les établissements de l'Hospitalité : - Établissement de Baguer-Morvan (35) - Hôpital et résidence de Bain-de-Bretagne (35) - Foyer de vie de l'Hospitalité - Guipry-Messac (35)  - Résidence La Fleur de Sel - Le Sel-de-Bretagne (35) - Maison de Moncontour (22) - Résidence de Plougastel (29) - Hôtel- Dieu de Pont l'Abbé (29) - HAD de Cornouaille - Quimper (29)  - Maison Saint-Joseph - Quimperlé (29)  - Maison Saint-Anne - Tinténiac (35)  - Polyclinique Saint-Laurent - Rennes (35)  - Maison Saint-Louis - Rennes (35)  - Résidence Bellevue - Saint-Grégoire (35) - Centre de gérontologie d'Aix-en-Provence (13) - La Bastide du Figuier (13) - Maison de Lambesc (13)  - Maison de Nicodème - Nantes (44)  - Résidence Saint-Jean-Eudes – Saint-Brieuc (22) - L’Ermitage Saint-Joseph – Saint-Brieuc (22) - Le Cèdre – Saint-Brieuc (22) Chiffres clés : 20 établissements 3 500 salariés 3 100 lits et places  312 millions d’euros de budget

Name: Lartisien
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris, 228 Rue De Rivoli, 75002
Company description: Lartisien is a luxury travel company specializing in curating exceptional experiences and accommodations for discerning travelers in Paris and beyond. With a mission to provide personalized service and unforgettable stays, Lartisien handpicks a collection of the finest hotels, ensuring guests enjoy unparalleled comfort and hospitality. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including affluent individuals and families seeking unique travel experiences, as well as corporate partners looking for premium accommodations for their executives. Lartisien's partnerships with renowned hotels such as Ritz Paris, Le Meurice, and Four Seasons Hotel George V reflect its commitment to excellence and luxury. By focusing on tailored itineraries and exclusive events, Lartisien aims to immerse its clients in the rich culture and vibrant lifestyle of Paris, making every visit a memorable journey.

Name: Sereno Hotels
HQ Location: Guadeloupe, St, 97133
Company description: With the addition of the Lake Como property and future expansions to be announced, Sereno Hotel Group is the private owner and operator of a small number of hotels at the upper echelon of the luxury market. Themes carried through each hotel will be a small, intimate number of rooms, locations in some of the world’s most coveted destinations, oversized rooms and suites, understated luxury, and exact attention to detail in design, service, cuisine and amenities.

Name: Blockade Runner Beach Resort
HQ Location: New Caledonia, Wrightsville Beach
Company description: The Blockade Runner Beach Resort on beautiful Wrightsville Beach provides the perfect location for your next corporate or social event. With over 7000 square feet of meeting space, our full service hotel can accommodate anything from large conferences to intimate leadership and development retreats. Our expansive oceanfront event lawns provide an ideal canvas for your next fundraiser, teambuilding excursion or catered affair. In addition to corporate events, conferences and trade shows, the resort offers an idyllic setting for destination weddings, family reunions, and other social events. For a truly unique board meeting setting consider our 13 bedroom oceanfront cottage with full access to all resort amenities. As North Carolina’s only surf-to-sound resort, every activity for a perfect beach getaway can be found within minutes of your guest room. Our luxurious resort offers complete services for sailing, fishing, kayaking, SUP and eco-tours. Our activities department can design any team building event to fit your group’s needs. A supervised “Sandcampers” program provides activities and island excursions for children ages 5-12. A complete fitness center, including whirlpool and dry sauna, are also on-site for your convenience, and enjoy yoga on the lawn in our seaside gardens. All rooms are either oceanfront or facing Banks Channel Sound with queen or king bed options. By sourcing only the freshest local produce, seafood, and meats, our award winning culinary team is sure to create a memorable experience whether it’s a privately catered function, casual lunch at the pool bar, or intimate dinner in EAST Oceanfront Dining.

Name: Hotel Royal-Riviera
HQ Location: France, Saint-jean-cap-ferrat, 3 Avenue Jean Monnet, 06230
Company description: Perched in the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat, with plunging views of the Provencal gardens and the Mediterranean, the five-star 94-room Hotel Royal-Riviera provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace.  L’Orangerie villa’s 16 rooms and suites each offer a large terrace overlooking the garden or the pool, or a balcony with a partial sea view. Guests may dine in the restaurant “La Table du Royal” or on its outdoor terrace, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, or during the season at the "Jasmin Grill & Lounge" poolside restaurant, facing the famous Villa Kerylos.  The hotel is 20 minutes drive from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. With the exception of a seven-week period when the hotel is closed during the winter, the hotel is open all year-round. The Royal-Riviera is a member of the Leading Hotels of the World.   Reservations  resa@royal-riviera.com / +33 (0)4 93 76 31 11 Sales Department  sales@royal-riviera.com / +33 (0)4 93 76 31 43

Name: Logis Hôtels Group
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Logis Hôtels Group is a leading hospitality company in France, dedicated to providing quality accommodations and exceptional dining experiences. With a mission centered on delivering outstanding service and a strong commitment to local gastronomy, the group operates a vast network of hotels and restaurants, including the esteemed Logis Hôtel Schaeffer Rest. Saint Georges. Their vision focuses on sustainability and community engagement, ensuring that guests not only enjoy comfort but also immerse themselves in the local culture and cuisine.  The target market for Logis Hôtels Group includes both leisure travelers and business professionals, offering tailored services such as evening stopovers, well-equipped meeting and seminar rooms, and gourmet dining options. The group prides itself on high customer satisfaction, reflected in an impressive average review rating of 9.5/10 across its establishments. Catering to families, couples, and solo adventurers, Logis Hôtels Group aims to provide authentic experiences in picturesque locations. In addition to its hospitality offerings, the group actively collaborates with local producers to source fresh, seasonal ingredients, thereby enhancing the dining experience while supporting the regional economy. The "Logis Loves Local" initiative exemplifies their commitment to local culture and products, fostering regional employment and supporting local hoteliers. With over 2,000 establishments across eight countries and six distinct brands, Logis Hôtels Group is a prominent network of independent hotel and restaurant operators in Europe.  By prioritizing sustainable practices and socially responsible hospitality, Logis Hôtels Group not only enhances the livelihoods of their hoteliers but also ensures that each guest's stay contributes positively to the surrounding community. Their loyalty program rewards guests for their patronage, allowing them to enjoy the best rates guaranteed while experiencing the unique charm of each location.

Name: Vatel Hôtel & Spa
HQ Location: France, Occitanie, Nîmes
Company description: This is the place for the Vatel students, to discover all facets of the hotel business. They spend their time in the different departments of a real hotel: Reception, Housekeeping, Human Resources, Sales & Marketing, Administration, etc.  They receive business and leisure guests to train themselves not only in Rooms division but also in the organization of banquets, meetings, weddings.

Name: La Créole Beach Hôtel & Spa ****
HQ Location: Guadeloupe, Guadeloupe, Le Gosier, 97190
Company description: Situé sur la Pointe de la Verdure au Gosier, La Créole Beach Hôtel & Spa**** est une adresse emblématique des Îles de Guadeloupe. Entre jardin tropical, plage de sable blanc et architecture aux accents boisés, l’hôtel conjugue authenticité créole et confort contemporain. Avec 210 chambres et suites réparties entre plusieurs catégories, de la Chambre Classique à la Suite Appartement, l’établissement s’adapte à toutes les envies, que ce soit pour un séjour de loisirs, un voyage en famille ou un déplacement professionnel. L’hôtel propose une expérience culinaire variée à travers : -	La Route des Épices, pour savourer un buffet aux saveurs du monde. -	Le Zawag, restaurant de bord de mer autour des grillades et de la pêche du jour. -	La Rhumerie, bar iconique où cocktails, tapas créoles et concerts rythment les soirées. Le Spa La Créole, signé PAYOT, invite à la détente avec ses soins, massages, sauna et hammam, accessibles aux clients résidents comme extérieurs. Doté de plusieurs salles de réunion modulables, d’une magnifique piscine et d’un emplacement privilégié à seulement 12 km de l’aéroport, La Créole Beach Hôtel & Spa**** est une destination idéale pour allier travail et évasion sous le soleil des Caraïbes. Membre du groupe Des Hôtels & Des Îles, acteur majeur de l’hôtellerie dans la Caraïbe, l’hôtel perpétue l’art de vivre créole à travers une hospitalité chaleureuse et raffinée.

Name: Saint James Paris
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Un château au cœur de la capitale, hôtel et club privé, intégralement repensé en 2021 par Laura Gonzalez. Dans le 16e arrondissement, à quelques pas de l'Arc de Triomphe et du Trocadéro, le Saint James Paris allie les services d'un hôtel de luxe à l'atmosphère d'une maison de famille.  Il offre 50 spacieuses chambres et suites au décor unique, un bar-bibliothèque, un restaurant gastronomique, Bellefeuille, tenu par le Chef Gregory Garimbay, une pergola dans les jardins, des salons privés, un spa Guerlain avec piscine et fitness. Une maison Vivre _ Les Maisons Bertrand. Le Saint James Paris est membre de Relais & Châteaux. A chateau in the centre of Paris, luxury hotel and private club. Fully redecorated in 2021 by Laura Gonzalez. In the heart of the exclusive 16th district, at a few steps from the Arc de Triomphe and the Trocadero, the Saint James Paris combines the services of a luxury hotel and the atmosphere of a home in  neoclassical decor. It offers 50 individually decorated spacious rooms & suites, a beautiful library-bar, a gourmet restaurant, Bellefeuille,with the cuisine of Chef Gregory Garimbay and a private garden, private rooms, as well as a Guerlain spa, a swimming pool and a fitness.  The Saint James Paris is a member of Relais & Châteaux.

Name: Les Prés D'Eugénie ***** - Maison Guérard
HQ Location: France, Nouvelle-aquitaine, Eugénie-les-bains, 334 Rue René Vielle, 40320
Company description: Les Prés d'Eugénie ***** - Maison Guérard, established in 1974 by Christine and Michel Guérard, is a prestigious five-star hotel and culinary destination located in the picturesque village of Eugénie-les-Bains, nestled in the Landes de Gascogne region of France. The estate spans 8 hectares and features five historic buildings, 45 elegantly appointed rooms and suites, and three renowned restaurants, including the Michelin three-star Restaurant Michel Guérard. The mission of Les Prés d'Eugénie is to provide an enchanting experience that harmonizes luxury, gastronomy, and wellness, with a focus on exceptional service and the celebration of nature's bounty. The hotel attracts discerning travelers seeking a unique blend of gourmet dining, relaxation at the Thermal Spa, and the beauty of its meticulously landscaped gardens. With a dedicated team of over 180 professionals, the Guérard family continues to uphold a legacy of excellence, making it a cherished destination for culinary enthusiasts and wellness seekers alike.

Name: MOB HOTEL MOB HOUSE
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Saint-ouen
Company description: MOB HOTEL MOB HOUSE is a pioneering hospitality brand that emphasizes social and environmental responsibility, having achieved B Corp certification, which signifies its commitment to high standards of performance in these areas. The company operates with a mission to create spaces that foster community, sharing, and transformation, positioning itself as more than just a place to stay but as a vibrant hub for human connection and responsible tourism. Its target market includes socially conscious travelers and individuals seeking unique experiences that align with their values. MOB HOTEL collaborates with partners who share its vision of a more equitable and sustainable world, inviting guests to participate in a movement that prioritizes the well-being of people and the planet. With locations in cities like Cannes, Paris, Lyon, and Bordeaux, MOB HOTEL aims to redefine hospitality by integrating a cooperative model that encourages others to join its mission.

Name: The Westin Paris - Vendôme
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: With Paris at its doorsteps, The Westin Paris – Vendôme,  is a perfect setting for an authentic and unique experience of the city. The hotel is ideally situated in the very heart of Paris between the Louvre and the Champs Elysées. Our 348 rooms and 80 suites offer a perfect balance between traditional Parisian influence and contemporary design as well as stunning views over the city and the Eiffel Tower.   Inaugurated in 1878 to welcome visitors for the World Fair Exhibition, the former Hotel Continental, now known as The Westin Paris-Vendôme, is a national treasure and landmark of the Second Empire. The hotel was designed by the architect Henri Blondel whose father in law, Charles Garnier, created the legendary Opera de Paris.   A total of 12 function rooms, including three splendid rooms in pure Empire style that bear witness to this rich history, are hosts to your fashion shows, gala dinners and international corporate events.   Our Le First restaurant welcomes you in a warm and elegant setting as well as our Bar Tuileries. During summer, experience our iconic outdoor terrace, a haven of peace, situated in our historic inner court.

Name: Centaurus Hospitality Management
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Centaurus Hospitality Management (anciennement Paris Inn Group) est la société de gestion hôtelière du groupe indépendant français Centaurus, dont l’ambition est de devenir une référence en Europe et dans le Monde. Déjà présent en France (Paris et sa région, Nice et Nîmes) et en Europe (Porto et Braga) grâce à ses hôtels, bars, restaurants et spas, Centaurus se développe destinations après destinations pour offrir à ses hôtes une odyssée de nouvelles expériences, toutes uniques mais avec le même esprit de famille. Plus d’informations sur www.groupecentaurus.com  - Centaurus Hospitality Management (formerly Paris Inn Group) is the hospitality management company of the independent French group Centaurus, whose ambition is to become a reference in Europe and the world. Already present in France (Paris and the surrounding region, Nice, and Nîmes) and in Europe (Porto and Braga) with its hotels, bars, restaurants and spas, Centaurus is developing destination after destination to offer its guests an odyssey of new experiences, all unique while sharing the same family spirit. More information: www.groupecentaurus.com

Name: Orient Express
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Orient Express is a prestigious company that has been synonymous with luxury travel since 1883, now embarking on a new chapter with the launch of La Dolce Vita Orient Express in April 2025. This innovative train, designed entirely in Italy, aims to redefine the essence of travel by offering eight meticulously crafted itineraries that showcase Italy's rich cultural heritage, stunning landscapes, and exquisite cuisine curated by renowned chef Heinz Beck. The company’s mission is to provide an unparalleled travel experience that celebrates the elegance and craftsmanship of Italian culture, targeting an international clientele seeking unique and immersive journeys. In collaboration with partners such as Arsenale, Trenitalia, and various cultural foundations, Orient Express is committed to promoting sustainable luxury tourism while enhancing the visibility of Italy's diverse regions. With plans to expand into luxury hotels and sailing yachts, Orient Express continues to elevate the art of travel, ensuring that each journey is a memorable celebration of Italy's heritage and hospitality.

Name: The Maybourne Riviera
HQ Location: France, Provence-alpes-côte D'azur, Roquebrune-cap-martin
Company description: The Maybourne Riviera is a luxurious hotel located on the stunning Côte d'Azur, offering guests an exquisite experience characterized by refined elegance and breathtaking panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel features beautifully designed accommodations, including the Panoramic Sea View rooms, which are flooded with natural light and equipped with modern amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. The Maybourne Riviera aims to provide an unparalleled level of service and hospitality, creating a serene and rejuvenating environment for its guests. Targeting discerning travelers seeking relaxation and indulgence, the hotel also partners with local businesses to offer exclusive access to private beaches, wellness activities, and gourmet dining experiences. With a commitment to excellence, The Maybourne Riviera is set to reopen on June 17, 2025, welcoming guests to a world of luxury and tranquility.

Name: VACANCES BLEUES AFFAIRES
HQ Location: France, Provence-alpes-côte D'azur, Marseille
Company description: VACANCES BLEUES AFFAIRES is a prominent player in the French tourism sector, specializing in providing exceptional vacation experiences across a variety of stunning destinations in France. Founded in 1971, the company is dedicated to making travel accessible to everyone, accepting ANCV holiday vouchers at all its locations, which allows clients to enjoy luxurious stays without financial strain. The mission of VACANCES BLEUES is to promote respectful and sustainable tourism while offering high-quality accommodations, from charming hotels to family-friendly clubs and residences. Their clientele includes families, couples, and individuals seeking relaxation or adventure, with a focus on providing tailored experiences that cater to diverse interests. With partnerships with local service providers, VACANCES BLEUES enhances guest experiences through exclusive offers on activities and excursions, ensuring memorable stays for all visitors.

Name: JO&JOE
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: JO&JOE has invented a place where travelling is not just about the destination, it’s all about the experience. Restaurant? Bar? Surf spot? Cocktail rooftop? Hostel? Hotel? We like to call it an open house. 📍 Hossegor Beach 📍 Paris (Gentilly & Nation) 📍 Vienna 📍 Medellin 📍 Rio de Janeiro 📍  Roma ⌛️ Budapest 💛 Open to everyone 💛

Name: ResidHotel
HQ Location: France, Provence-alpes-côte D'azur, Mougins
Company description: ResidHotel manages 20 self catered and catered aparthotels all over France. Located on mountains resorts, seaside, countryside and city side, ResidHotel apartments offer an alternative accommodation to feel like at home, when you travel for business or leisure, whatever your lenght of stay.

Name: ASTOTEL Paris
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Astotel Paris it’s 16 hotels right in the heart of Paris. Astotel, a family story! Our adventure begins in 1961 with the purchase by Mr. Leon CACHAN of the Hotel Astra Opera, at 29 rue Caumartin in Paris. Then the great story continues with the acquisition of two other hotels by the brothers George, Serge, and Jean-Pierre CACHAN: the Hotel Astoria in 1971 and then the Bergere in 1980 (now 34B).Astotel is today a group of 16 three and four-star design hotels situated in the most prestigious areas of Paris that are the 2nd, 8th and 9th districts. A bouquet of benefits Enriched by over 50 years of experience, our hotels always offer more and more services: in addition to the open-bar offered each afternoon and the free Wi-Fi, the mini-bar (non-alcoholic drinks only) is available free of charge in all of our rooms. With our latest innovation, the Asto Tour, Astotel is delighted to offer its customers a Pass giving access to the open-bars of all 16 Astotel hotels that they can use during their travels in Paris for a well-deserved break. A quality recognized by TripAdvisor Today our customers thank us in the best way possible and make us very proud by hoisting high the Astotel flag in the TripAdvisor rankings for Paris, with an acclaimed value for money. Thus, in 2016, the Joke, 123 Sebastopol, 34B, Bradford, Augustin and 123 Elysees hotels are in the top 50 among more than 1,800 establishments evaluated in Paris. Like more than two hundred thousand customers every year, let yourself be tempted by a unique experience in the heart of Paris and rich in wonderful sensations in the Astotel universe!

Name: Groupe ACCELIS
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Bussy-saint-georges
Company description: Le Groupe Accelis est un groupe indépendant organisé autour de 4 pôles: Hôtellerie Restauration Immobilier Luxe Multiservices

Name: Château De Berne
HQ Location: France, Provence-alpes-côte D'azur, Lorgues, 83510 Route De Salernes, 83510
Company description: Château de Berne is a luxurious destination in Provence, offering a unique blend of hospitality, gastronomy, and wellness. The estate features a range of accommodations, including a hotel, villas, and a Michelin-starred restaurant, Le Jardin de Berne, which emphasizes a locavore approach by sourcing ingredients from its own gardens and local producers. The mission of Château de Berne is to provide an exceptional experience that celebrates the rich culinary heritage of Provence while fostering a deep connection with nature and local culture. The venue caters to a diverse clientele, including couples, families, and groups, and is also a popular choice for weddings, seminars, and corporate incentives. With a focus on well-being, outdoor activities, and culinary education through its cookery school, Château de Berne aims to create memorable experiences that resonate with guests seeking relaxation and indulgence in a picturesque setting.

Name: HappyCulture Hôtels
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: HappyCulture Hôtels is a distinguished hospitality group that operates a collection of four-star hotels across various cities in France and Switzerland, including Paris, Nice, Bordeaux, and Nyon. The company is dedicated to providing guests with a unique blend of comfort, elegance, and local charm, ensuring a memorable stay through exceptional service and thoughtfully designed accommodations. With a mission to create enriching experiences for travelers, HappyCulture Hôtels aims to immerse guests in the cultural and historical essence of each location, from picturesque lakeside views to vibrant urban settings. The target market includes leisure travelers, families, and business professionals seeking both relaxation and convenience. By partnering with local attractions and offering tailored services, HappyCulture Hôtels enhances the overall guest experience, making it a preferred choice for those looking to explore the rich heritage and beauty of their destinations.

Name: Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Entre le Faubourg Saint-Honoré, la Concorde et les Champs-Elysées, à deux pas des plus célèbres musées et monuments, des institutions les plus prestigieuses et des plus belles boutiques de luxe, découvrez l'art de vivre et les tendances de la capitale dans un cadre d'exception dédié à l'élégance et à la mode.  Le luxueux design de Didier Gomez, l'inspiration couture, la lumière, l'élégance des matières, le style sont l'expression même du luxe parisien. Le charme d'un hôtel particulier du XVIIIe siècle s'harmonise avec la modernité "arty" du design. Laissez-vous séduire par le prestige de suites aux allures d'appartements privés ou par l'exceptionnel penthouse donnant sur les toits de Paris. Un dîner chic et romantique au restaurant Blossom, un déjeuner près du murmure des fontaines, entre fleurs et palmiers, une coupe de champagne dans l’univers ultra-mode du Bar du Faubourg, ou un cocktail en terrasse pour voir et être vu … Savourez l'esprit Faubourg !

Name: Weekendesk
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Weekendesk est une entreprise française spécialisée dans la création et la vente de séjours locaux, offrant une large gamme de forfaits incluant hébergement et activités. Depuis sa fondation en 2008, la société s'est engagée à fournir des expériences mémorables à ses clients, en leur permettant de s'évader du quotidien et de découvrir de nouvelles destinations en France et en Europe. Avec une équipe multiculturelle de plus de 150 employés, Weekendesk vise à apporter plaisir et détente à ses utilisateurs, en proposant des escapades adaptées à toutes les occasions, y compris des coffrets cadeaux personnalisables. La clientèle de Weekendesk comprend des particuliers à la recherche de moments de loisirs, ainsi que des entreprises souhaitant offrir des expériences à leurs employés ou partenaires. Grâce à des partenariats avec des hôtels et des prestataires d'activités, Weekendesk s'efforce de garantir des séjours de qualité tout au long de l'année.

Name: VeryChic
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Founded in 2011 by Hervé Lafont, Nicolas Clair et Charles Decaux, Verychic is a members only travel agency dedicated to outstanding luxury hotels and getaways. Verychic is part of Accor group since 2017. Thanks to more than 10 years of travel industry experience and our teams of experts, we are able to secure exceptional offers of up to 70% off. VeryChic has built its success on its exigence for quality and its liabilty to provide exclusive offers in some of the finest hotels all around the world. Our hotel partners include major luxury hotel brands such as  Sofitel, Pullman, MGallery, Marriott, Hyatt etc. Verychic is the fastest growing on-line travel agency in the French market thanks to: - +100 employees passionate about hospitality located in our Barcelona office - +5000  hotels partnerships worldwide - +8 million members

Name: Novotel Paris Les Halles
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: • Novotel Paris Les Halles  Moderne et élégant, notre hôtel 4 étoiles contemporain offre une vaste gamme de services et d’équipements de luxe tout proche du quartier du Marais et à quelques pas seulement du Louvre et de Notre Dame. Les équipes du Novotel Paris les Halles assurent à nos clients un séjour unique et sur mesure ; admirez le décor « Arty » et les oeuvres murales attrayantes des artistes Mel et Kio, offrez-vous un cocktail dans le Jardin Privé à l’abri de la foule parisienne ou rejoignez une ambiance plus survoltée au Bar avec ses concerts Live. • Atelier H  Sortez du cadre et adoptez l'Atelier H !  Situé au coeur de Paris, l'Atelier H propose 600 m² d'espaces séminaires atypiques totalement réinventés. Découvrez nos 7 studios créés par le célèbre designer écossais Jim Hamilton. • Jardin Privé  Véritable « havre de paix » en plein cœur de l’effervescence parisienne, le Jardin Privé saura vous satisfaire grâce à nos superbes créations de cocktails et l'atmosphère chaleureuse du lieu.

Name: Machefert Group
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris, 256 Rue Saint-honoré, 75001
Company description: Reconnu pour son audace et sa créativité, le groupe évolue fortement depuis l’arrivée de Kevin Machefert en Janvier 2022, et lance un challenge sur 3 ans : Devenir le groupe boutique-hospitality référent du « savoir-recevoir » surprenant et détonnant.   En effet, la satisfaction de nos clients ne se résume pas à des établissements magnifiques et une qualité de service irréprochable. Elle s’accompagne d’un petit JE-NE-SAIS-QUOI qui fait et fera la différence. Celui d’aller toujours plus loin, de laisser libre court à notre créativité, pour étonner nos hôtes et leur donner la possibilité de vivre une expérience singulière, loin de la vie ordinaire.   Nous nous engageons à tenir notre promesse auprès de nos clients et auprès de nos employés: ESCAPE THE ORDINARY.   Nos valeurs:   GÉNÉROSITÉ Nos clients sont plus que des clients. Ils sont nos hôtes, des individus à part entière que l’on prend plaisir à recevoir, à bien recevoir.  Tel un esprit de famille, nous mettons l’écoute et l’empathie au coeur de nos actions et choix au quotidien. Une bienveillance valable envers nos équipes et notre environnement.   PLAISIR Celui de nos collaborateurs autant que nos clients, voilà ce qui nous anime avant tout et surtout. Parce que le plaisir, c’est la vie, et que celui-ci est contagieux… Voilà pourquoi nos hôtels sont des lieux de vie, au sein desquels des souvenirs  se créent, des rires éclatent, des moments de joie se dessinent.   OPINIÂTRETÉ Entrepreneurs dans l’âme, nos projets naissent de vraies convictions, et d’une volonté sans faille de combler nos hôtes. C’est ainsi que la rigueur, la qualité et l’excellence de nos offres sont au coeur de notre identité et des attentes de chacun de nos clients. Ne jamais faire les choses à moitié, mais toujours aller jusqu’au bout, et au-delà.   AUDACE Aller toujours plus loin pour nos clients, proposer des expériences like no other, chez Machefert, nous partons du principe que tout est possible.

Name: CDS
HQ Location: France, Île-de-france, Paris
Company description: Founded in 2001 and led by its founder and shareholder, Ziad Minkara, CDS is the French market leader and a key player in technology integration for the hotel and business travel sector across Europe. Its comprehensive hotel booking platform is designed to meet the needs of both corporate clients and travel management companies (TMCs). CDS stands out with dedicated customer support in each country, tailored sourcing to support its clients, an extensive and diversified hotel content offering, robust payment solutions, and advanced reporting tools to help companies better manage their travel spend. In 2022, the Group expanded its services with the acquisition of Goelett, an online booking tool for TMCs, and strengthened its presence in Italy by opening an office in Rome.
